import React, { Component } from 'react' export default class Toddler extends Component { render() { console.log(this.props.toddlerShow, this.props.toddlerId, "Toddler") let toddler = this.props.toddlerShow const handleDelete = (event, toddler) => { console.log(event, "toddler filter delete") let deleteEvent = event.target.className if(deleteEvent === 'delete') { console.log('inside delete button') console.log(event, "delete event") // let parsedToddlerId = parseInt(event.target.dataset.id) this.props.delete(toddler) } } return (

Toddler component

{toddler.name}'s profile

Birthday Emergency Contact Phone Allergy
{toddler.birthday} {toddler.emergency_contact} {toddler.phone} {toddler.allergy}
handleDelete(event, toddler)}/>
) } }
